metadata.title: CVE-2020-11986 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: To be able to analyze gradle projects, the build scripts need to beexecuted. Apache NetBeans follows this pattern. This causes the code of thebuild script to be invoked at load time of the project. Apache NetBeans upto and including 12.0 did not request consent from the user for theanalysis of the project at load time. This in turn will run potentiallymalicious code, from an external source, without the consent of the user.

criterions.comment: netbeans: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
